    • Uses of Report in GNServer

      Methods in GNServer with parameters of type Report 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CanceledReport DataBaseController.CreateCanceledReport(Report report)
      Generates a report detailing the number of unresolved and canceled reservations for a park over a given period.
      CanceledReport DataBaseController.CreateCanceledReportForAllParks(Report report)
      Creates a consolidated report of canceled visits and unresolved orders for all parks.
      java.lang.String DataBaseController.CreateUseReport(Report report)
      Creates a usage report for a specific park and time period.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> DataBaseController.DisplayUseReport(Report report)
      Generates a list of dates and times when the park was not at full capacity within a given date range.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> DataBaseController.GetTotalVisitorsNumReport(Report report)
      Retrieves the total number of single and group visitors from a previously generated report.
      boolean DataBaseController.IsUseReportExist(Report report)
      Checks if a use report already exists for a specified date range and park.
      java.lang.String DataBaseController.TotalVisitorsNumReport(Report report)
      Generates a total visitor number report for a specific park and time period.
      java.util.ArrayList<Visit> DataBaseController.VisitReport(Report report)
      Generates a report of visits for a specific park within a given date range where the reservation status was 'Inactive'.
